item.title: Big O Notation
item.description: Big-O Notation All of these issues can multiply runtimes by (large) constants. So measure runtime in a way that ignores constant multiples Problem Unfortunately, 1 second, 1 hour, 1 year only differ by constant multiples Classifies Growth Rate Cleans up Notation Can Ignore Complicated Details Warning Using Big-O loses important information about constant multiples Big-O is only asymptotic Asymptotic notation (article) | Algorithms | Khan Academy
